entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: mvc #61742
  • Perf regression: https, json, json #61741
  • Perf improvement: mvc #61740
  • Min API validation throws when IValidatableObject returns ValidationResult without MemberNames #61739
  • Min API validation NRE when ValidationContext is not set on ValidateContext #61738
  • Min API validation doesn't consider List<T>? members #61737
  • Microsoft.Net.Http.Headers.SetCookieHeaderValue.TryParse throws System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException #61735

Closed

  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef #61716
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware #61731
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #61732
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `aspnetcore/release/9.0` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #61513
  • password icon (eye) is black in dark mode #61691
  • Perf regression: json #61727

PullRequests

Created

  • Swap out Win11 for Win-VS2022 in CI #61743
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-preview.4.25216.37 #61720
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 10.0-preview5
  • [Identity] Fix Identity UI asset definitions #59100
    Servicing-approved, area-identity, 9.0.5
  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #61730
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 10.0-preview5
  • [main] (deps): Bump dotnet/arcade from 76dd1b4eb3b15881da350de93805ea6ab936364c to 11c848003df85813f4821fec2d43290fd4ca8594 #61695
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview5
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `155b337` to `cd430b4` #61694
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview5

Updated

  • Blazor - rendering metrics and tracing #61609
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview5
  • Update MicrosoftBuildVersion to 17.8.3 #61322
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix handling of parsable types in validations generator #61728
    area-minimal, feature-validation
  • Follow-up: Improve stopping renderer, fix identity template #61633
    area-blazor, feature-prerendering, feature-blazor-navigation, .NET 10 Planning
  • update template descriptions to be more beginner-friendly #61593
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • feat: support tls client hello bytes callback in Kestrel #61631
    area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cosmos/Test: investigate overflow failures in cosmos tests and why they don't show up on CI #36012

Closed

  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `efcore/release/9.0` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #36007

  • Is it possible to use FromSql with OrderBy and a dynamic column when using Include? #35998

PullRequests

Merged

  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #36011

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Remove ALL platform specifics and make it implemented everywhere #29251
  • [Testing] Appium test does not perform the tap action with CarouselView. #29245
  • x:Static Binding StringFormat not working in release #29238
  • String format Shadow causes a crash in release #29237
  • Window height and width fixed based on initial orientation #29236

Closed

  • MAUI: You must set `NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription` in your Info.plist file to use the Permission: Photos." #29249
  • VisualState for ImageButton doesn't change from Pressed state back to Normal or Focused #13870
  • Buttons with images not cropping correctly on screen resize on macOS if using ContentLayout #15003
  • [iOS] CollectionView cell not expanding on label expanding to wrap #28454
  • CollectionView2 Header Overlaps Items on iOS When Resized #28541
  • WinUI apps do not handle "win-x64" RuntimeIdentifier's correctly #20299
    .NET 10.0-preview2
  • ቢኒያም ደብረብርሃን ደላላ #29156

PullRequests

Created

  • [Testing] Fix for flaky UITests in CI that occasionally fail - 9 #29248

  • [Windows] Fix CarouselView EmptyView display when filtering to zero items #29247
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

Merged

    .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [net10.0][ci] Update sdk and runtime for preview4 channel #29246
    area-infrastructure, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [Android] Added Platform specific ripple color #23599
    proposal/open, community ✨, area-controls-button, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • Removed Frame styles from the default project template #29222
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix typo in source-gen error: soruce -> source #29242
    area-xaml, community ✨
  • [tests] On 9.0.4 theres no build warning for System.Text.Json #29243
  • Changes in Android cake to fix emulator boot issues on Linux #29123
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • Nullable DatePicker (make Date, MinimumDate & MaximumDate nullable) #27921
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-datetimepicker, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • Modernize MediaPicker iOS #28920
    area-essentials, essentials-mediapicker, .NET 10.0-preview4

Updated

  • Compute LayoutConstraints on new *StackLayout and Grid #28931
    area-layout, community ✨, t/perf, platform/any, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Windows] Upgrade `Microsoft.Graphics.Win2D` from `1.2.0` to `1.3.2` to fix a build warning #28885

  • [iOS] NavigationBarHiddenAnimation - iOS specifics #29220
    proposal/open, area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨, .NET 10.0-preview5
  • Obsolete UseMauiCompatibility for .NET 10 #29021
    t/breaking 💥, area-compatibility, .NET 10.0-preview4

  • [Testing] Fix for UITest Catalyst screenshot dimension inconsistency and image cropping issue #29204

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Move NetLatest to target net9.0 #78378
  • Validate go-to-def and find-refs for user defined instance compound operators. #78375
  • Any usage of extension indexers leads to CS0021 #78372
  • Visual Studio 2022 C#, 'forr' code snippet creates strange looking code #78368
    Backlog

Closed

  • VisualStudioWorkspace.WorkspaceChanged should be replaced with an off-UI-thread solution #78091
    18.0
  • Roslyn crashed in generic when assigned await expression into ref returned locals #76999
    17.14
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.copilot-agent-mcp-36028.40 #78366
  • IDE0047: Removing parentheses around a int array that is in a list, creates code that can not be compiled #78331
  • Spread element does not emit nullability warning when converting to certain collection types #78307
    Next
  • Regression: overload resolution changed in the language preview #78314
  • IDE0025 code fixer changes semantics and sometimes suggests invalid code. #77473
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-10528.67 #78362

PullRequests

Created

  • PooledObjects cleanup #78382
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Unify roslyn analyzers on single version #78381
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Disable nuget warning new in net10 as is likely false positives for roslyn #78380
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move more collections and collection related extensions to MS.CA.Collections source package #78379
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove suppression and fix VSTHRD100 #78373
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Extensions: xml docs #78365
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow Razor cohosting to hook into configuration change notifications #78364
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Do not leak cancellation exception for our own operation #78376
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use ActivationConstraint.FeatureFlag API to control when Semantic Search is enabled #77133
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge branch 'main' into 'extensions' #78374
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Optimize work done in ProjectCodeModelFactory #78369
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add conditional access to test plan #78377
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Update `RuntimeHelpers.Await` rules #77957
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Runtime Async, Next
  • Add legacy workspace eventing APIs to the banned list inside roslyn #78370
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Move Range and Index to Contracts source package #78371
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Cleanup the code we have to run copilot code in parallel #78324
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add dump reporting for https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/issues/76225 (#78354) #78367
    untriaged, VSCode
  • Filter out CompilerFeatureRequired and Obsolete attribute from method symbols #78313
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Required Members, Next
  • Update Language Feature Status.md #78358
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Move remaining legacy workspace event listeners over to new APIs. #78333
    VSCode, Next
  • Fix async hoisted type substituted local #78231
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Insert missing space in XML documentation #78361
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Do not offer 'remove unnecessary parens' when it would change a collection initializer #78336
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • minor cleanup (no functional change) #78363
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Do not offer use-expr-body for properties with initializers #78360
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Switch to microbuild to publish PR val build symbols #77088
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Reduce duplicated FileUtilities.GetFileTimeStamp calls #78321
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Switch to using field+auto-prop #76906
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add code for analzying copilot changes. #78353
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Move runtime async method validation into initial binding #78310
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Runtime Async
  • Dictionary expressions: extend support for key-value pairs to non-dictionary collections of `KeyValuePair<K, V>` #78274
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Precursor work to merge EditorFeatures.WPF into EditorFeatures. #78308
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • Extension methods #78328
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add support for FieldRva to EnC delta #78033
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, Feature - String Literals in Data Section as UTF8
  • Extract base LanguageServerProjectLoader from LanguageServerProjectSystem #78329
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Delete copy of System.IO.Hashing sources #78357
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Extensions: analyzer actions #78319
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Add workflow to manage 'collecting-feedback' labeled issues #78296
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix syntax tree creation when modifying source generated documents #78343
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fuzzlyn windows-x86 pipeline often times out some partitions #115171
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'm_dfsTree != nullptr' #115168
  • Project with spaces (or other characters) doesn't build with NativeAOT on Android #115165
  • Consider running System.Security.Cryptography tests on Windows 10 Threshold #115162
  • System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.PfxTests.ReadMLKem512PrivateKey_NotSupported failing with CryptographicException #115156
    10.0.0
  • Eliding span Slice bounds checking is not trivial #115154
  • AOT publish from `dotnet publish` generates error message, but seems to complete anyway #115153
  • Xml.Tests OOM on Wasm #115152
  • [Apple mobile] NativeAOT smoke tests fail on all Apple mobile jobs: "You must install or update .NET to run this application." #115149
  • [API Proposal]: Expose Vector Dataype in SqlDbType #115148
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 7 Regressions on 4/24/2025 6:44:30 PM +00:00 #115155
  • ILLink removes embedded sources #115145
  • MemoryCache creates lots of tasks that cause CPU/Memory spikes on compaction in net8 LTS. #115142
  • How to resolve AOT when using Marshal.PtrToStructure occurs IL2091 warnings #115140
  • X509CertificateLoader can't load public key from pfx file without password #115137

Closed

  • [RuntimeAsync] EnC support #115095
    Future
  • [mono][arm6][linux] System.Net.Tests.ServicePointManagerTest.FindServicePoint_Collectible failed. #64674
    Future
  • . net8.0.15 startup does not respond #114888
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 1 Regression on 2/19/2025 12:45:56 PM +00:00 #113736
    10.0.0
  • State of WASM support in Net 9 #113858
  • No `v10.0.0-preview.3` release/tag? #115146
  • Wrong exception thrown by MLKem.ImportPkcs8PrivateKey for a too-small buffer #115063
    10.0.0
  • The method returns inconsistent expected results after running it about 10,000 times #108811
    8.0.x
  • [API Proposal]: Accept HttpCompletionOptions to more places #115106
  • Should we update Raspbian? #115029
  • Debugger report `null` for uninited static struct field in classes without an `.cctor` #39993
  • Runtime System.Private.CoreLib patches pdbs #108912
  • [API Proposal]: Make Range struct a Enumberable #115138
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 3 Regressions on 11/2/2023 12:57:39 AM #94475
    10.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 4 Regressions in System.Collections.CreateAddAndRemove<String> #109734
    10.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 1 Regression on 1/25/2025 3:08:25 PM +00:00 #111920
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [RuntimeAsync] Moving tests from runtimelabs. #115169
    test-enhancement, needs-area-label, runtime-async
  • backport free-list change to release/9.0-staging #115167
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix culture creation with undetermined lang tag #115166
    area-System.Globalization, 10.0.0
  • Fix regression caused by overload resolution. #115164
    area-System.Buffers, 10.0.0
  • Exclude --gcc-toolchain from cross arg #115163
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • ML-DSA+COSE #115158
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [cDAC] IXCLRDataStackWalk::GetContext returns proper HResult #115157
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [wasm][aot] Fill in some missing intrinsics cases #115151
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • JIT: Decrease Gauss-Seidel stop residual #115150
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WinHTTP] Fix certificate caching timeout #115144
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [QUIC] Delete ActiveIssues on SupportedLinuxPlatforms_IsSupportedIsTrue test #115141
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix regex description emitted by generator for switched branches #115136
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions

Merged

  • Delete s390x and ppc64le helix queues #115161
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix ML-KEM test to use PBES1+3DES #115160
    area-System.Security, test-bug, 10.0.0
  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #115114
    area-codeflow
  • Update Alma Linux 8 -> 9 #115132
    needs-area-label
  • Fix markdownl lint #115159
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Remove HoistedLocal from runtime-async spec #112918
    runtime-async
  • Simplify 64-bit platform conditions #115083
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable CoreCLR/tvOS build #111804
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-tvos, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2698317 #115007
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Remove a couple unnecessary 'lock(this)' statements #115013
    area-System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter, 10.0.0
  • ML-KEM: PKCS12/PFX Loading #115100
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0
  • ML-KEM: Fix-up ASN.1 reading and writing logic #115066
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0
  • Remove Raspbian 10 #115129
    area-Infrastructure
  • Update gcc leg from v14 to v15 #115128
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution

Updated

  • JIT: Add runtime async transformation #114861
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, runtime-async
  • Interpreter EH support in the runtime #114649
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Adding additional 8 eGPR. #113988
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • GC Distribute Free list port from .NET 10 #115023
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm] Use packedsimd in hexconverter #115062

    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [DRAFT] Write barrier without any RWX pages #114982
    area-VM-coreclr

  • Improve System.Collections.BitArray #115069
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Minor tensor fixes #115125
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • JIT: use root compiler instance for sufficient PGO observation #115119
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix R2R files doublemap on UNIX #113082
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [cDAC] Implement ISOSDacImpl.GetAssemblyList #114800
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [Android] Support static linking of CoreCLR on Android #114629
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-android, 10.0.0
  • Fix missing coverage of F# resources in linker RemoveResourcesStep #115116
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Add bootstrapping build mechanism and enable for SourceBuild #114285
    source-build, area-Infrastructure
  • [Android] Run CoreCLR library tests on Android #114148
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-android, 10.0.0
  • Add VMOVD VMOVW APIs in JIT #115068
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Accelerate long -> floating casts on x86 #113930
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add CPUID for AvxVnniInt8 and AvxVnniInt16 #113956
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Implementation for `UnsafeAccessorTypeAttribute` #114881

Issues

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Windows: dotnet workload restore: Workload update failed: Could not find a part of the path #48769
  • [NETSDKE2E]Libicu package dependency issue with .NET 8.0 and 9.0 May 2025 Update builds on Ubuntu25.04 #48767
  • [NETSDKE2E][Loc][Regression]With NET 10 preview4 SDK installed in loc OS, some strings are not localized in output of "dotnet build --help". #48765
  • dotnet run #48764
  • [NETSDKE2E][VMR][Regression][VScode]ASP.Net symbols are missing for IL symbols. #48762

Closed

  • Unable to publish multiple projects at the same time. #7238
    Discussion
  • Reenable the `Microsoft.DotNet.Cli.Run.Tests.GivenDotnetRunBuildsCsproj.ItDefaultsToTheFirstUsableLaunchProfile` test #42841
    10.0.1xx
  • [NETSDKE2E][VMR]telemetry events cannot displays in fiddler tool. #48516
  • [NETSDKE2E][VMR][Regression]CoreFX symbols are missing for IL symbols. #48716
